comments.text: Currently it just string compares the path but it is possible to have a case insensitive filesystem on OSX in which case paths that only differ by case should be considered to be the same.
comments.raw_text: Currently it just string compares the path but it is possible to have a case insensitive filesystem on OSX in which case paths that only differ by case should be considered to be the same.
comments.author: dtownsend@mozilla.com
comments.creator: dtownsend@mozilla.com
